content: * to * 11 more times finish with a slip_stitch in the top of first fpdc fasten_off 24 fpdc 24 ch3 round 6 join colour f around a chain 3 space between the 2 fpdc * puff st chain 2 puff st chain 2 puff st around chain 3 space 3 single_crochet in next chain 3 space chain 1* repeat from * to * 11 more times finish with a slip_stitch in the top of first puff st fasten_off 36 puff st 24 ch2 36 single_crochet 12 ch1 round 7 join colour b around chain 2 space between 1st and 2nd puff of round 6 * puff st chain 2 puff st in chain 2 space puff st in 2nd chain 2 space chain 2 puff st in chain 2 space chain 2* repeat from * to * 11 more times finish with a slip_stitch in the top of first puff st fasten_off 48 puff st 36 ch2 round 8 join colour a around chain 2 space between 1st and 2nd puff of round 7 * 2 puff st in chain 2 space puff st between 2nd and 3rd puff of round 7 2 puff st in chain 2 space 3 single_crochet in next chain 2 space* repeat from * to * 11 more times finish with a slip_stitch in the top of the first puff st fasten_off 60 puff st 36 single_crochet round 9 join colour e around 3rd puff st of round 8 * fpdc chain 3 fpdc around puff st chain 3 double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet in 2nd single_crochet of round 8 chain 3* repeat from * to * 11 more times finish with a slip_stitch in the top of first fpdc fasten_off 24 fpdc 24 double_crochet 48 chain 3 round 10 join colour c around chain 3 space between 2 fpdc in round 9 *5 double_crochet in chain 3 space slip_stitch around next chain 3 space 5 double_crochet in next chain 3 space slip_stitch around next chain 3 space* repeat from * to * 11 more times finish with a slip_stitch in the top of first double_crochet fasten_off 120 double_crochet 24 slip_stitch round 11 join colour e over any slip_stitch made between shells in round 10 * double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet over slip_stitch chain 3* repeat from * to * 23 more times finish with a slip_stitch in the top of first double_crochet fasten_off 48 double_crochet 48 chain 3 round 12 join colour d around chain 3 space made between 2 double_crochet in round 11 * 3 double_crochet picot 3 double_crochet in chain 3 space slip_stitch in next chain 3 space* repeat from * to * 23 more times finish with a slip_stitch in the top of first double_crochet fasten_off 144 double_crochet 24 picot 24 slip_stitch © zoe ellison / confessions of a
